mapper.insert: insert into omakase.post(title, content, user_id, category) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{category})
mapper.update: update omakase.post set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category = #{category} where post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: select * from omakase.post where category = #{category} order by createdAt desc
select p.post_id, p.title, DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as created_at, u.nickname from POST p join user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id order by p.created_at desc
